author: gudrutis
body:
New PR.

@smuzaffar , can you give me some tips on how to proceed in checkOptionsLocalSource() function?
If I have to guess, I should call linux commands and execute it to given paths, something like:
```python
    if filename.endswith(".tar"):
        os.system("tar -cvf %s/%s %s" % (downloadDir, filename, localDir) )
        # should look like  os.system("tar -cvf tar2/tar1.tar tar1/ )

```
title: Develop
